snippet: The German suit seeks to block a bond-buying plan by the European Central Bank that has never been used — but might be soon, if allowed.

byline.original: By JAMES KANTER and JACK EWING

lead_paragraph: The German suit seeks to block a bond-buying plan by the European Central Bank that has never been used — but might be soon, if allowed.

headline.main: In Court, Lawyer Calls E.C.B. Bond Plan ‘an Egregious Extension’ of Powers
headline.print_headline: In Court, Lawyer Calls E.C.B. Bond Plan ‘an Egregious Extension’ of Powers
